title: "Ex-Google AI ethics chief: Boost worker power to curb harmful AI"
excerpt: "Governments need to curb the power of tech companies and increase the power of workers in order to safeguard people from unsafe uses of artificial intelligence, Google's former AI ethics chief Timnit Gebru told a hearing at the European Parliament on Tuesday."
